meanings.definition: The state of being mentally deranged or insane.
meanings.sent1: Her dementedness was evident in her wild eyes.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with severe dementedness.
meanings.sent3: Despite his dementedness, he still had a kind heart.
meanings.sent4: The dementedness of the situation was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The dementedness of the asylum sent shivers down her spine.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being demented.
meanings.sent1: The dementedness of his behavior was concerning.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't ignore the dementedness in his laughter.
meanings.sent3: The dementedness of the clown's act made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The dementedness of the painting captured his attention.
meanings.sent5: His dementedness shone through in his erratic movements.
